title: Induced Angular Momentum in (2+1)-Dimensional Spinor Electrodynamics in Curved Space
abstract: Effects due to fermion-vacuum polarization by an external static magnetic field are considered in a two-dimensional noncompact curved space with a nontrivial topology. An expression for the vacuun angular momentum is obtained. Like the vacuum fermion number, it proves to be dependent on the global characteristics of the field and space.
